Text:
Install/Graphics issue for ATI cards: Running live, open synaptic package manager from the administration menu. Search "nvidia-settings" and mark for complete removal. Also perform this step after install. 

Login: sockpuppet64
Password: xxx

To change password after install open terminal and type
sudo passwd root   (that is not a typo for password)

Apologies to those affected.
